name: Microsoft Entra ID Tool
semantic_context: Interact with Microsoft Entra ID API
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft Entra ID Tool 节点。主要用于: Interact with Microsoft Entra ID API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Interact with Microsoft Entra ID API
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Interact with Microsoft Entra ID API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: user
available_options: Group (值: group)
User (值: user)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Add to Group (值: addGroup) - Add user to group
Create (值: create) - Create a user
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a user
Get (值: get) - Retrieve data for a specific user
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve a list of users
Remove from Group (值: removeGroup) - Remove user from group
Update (值: update) - Update a user

groupType.name: groupType
available_options: Microsoft 365 (值: Unified)
Security (值: )

displayName.name: displayName
displayName.description: The name to display in the address book for the user
displayName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Display Name | 作用: The name to display in the address book for the user | (必填项)

mailNickname.name: mailNickname
mailNickname.description: The mail alias for the user
mailNickname.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mail Nickname | 作用: The mail alias for the user | (必填项)

mailEnabled.name: mailEnabled
mailEnabled.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mail Enabled | 作用: Whether the group is mail-enabled | 默认值: False | (必填项)

membershipType.name: membershipType
available_options: Assigned (值: ) - Lets you add specific users as members of a group and have unique permissions
Dynamic (值: DynamicMembership) - Lets you use rules to automatically add and remove users as members

securityEnabled.name: securityEnabled
securityEnabled.description: Whether the group is a security group
securityEnabled.natural_language_description: 参数名: Security Enabled | 作用: Whether the group is a security group | 默认值: True

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: aboutMe (值: None) - A freeform text entry field for the user to describe themselves
ageGroup (值: None) - Sets the age group of the user
birthday (值: None) - The birthday of the user
businessPhones (值: None) - The telephone number for the user
city (值: None) - The city in which the user is located
companyName (值: None) - The name of the company associated with the user
consentProvidedForMinor (值: None) - Specifies if consent is provided for minors
country (值: None) - The country/region of the user
department (值: None) - The department name where the user works
employeeId (值: None) - Employee identifier assigned by the organization
employeeType (值: None) - Defines enterprise worker type
employeeHireDate (值: None) - The hire date of the user
employeeLeaveDateTime (值: None) - The date and time when the user left or will leave the organization
employeeOrgData (值: None) - Represents organization data (for example, division and costCenter) associated with a user
givenName (值: None) - The given name (first name) of the user
forceChangePassword (值: None) - Whether the user must change their password on the next sign-in
interests (值: None) - A list for the user to describe their interests
jobTitle (值: None) - The user's job title
surname (值: None) - The user's last name (family name)
mail (值: None) - The SMTP address for the user
mobilePhone (值: None) - The primary cellular telephone number for the user
mySite (值: None) - The URL for the user's personal site
officeLocation (值: None) - The office location for the user
onPremisesImmutableId (值: None) - This property is used to associate an on-premises Active Directory user account to their Microsoft Entra user object
otherMails (值: None) - Additional email addresses for the user
passwordPolicies (值: None) - Specifies password policies
pastProjects (值: None) - A list of past projects the user has worked on
postalCode (值: None) - The postal code for the user's address
preferredLanguage (值: None) - User's preferred language in ISO 639-1 code
responsibilities (值: None) - A list of responsibilities the user has
schools (值: None) - A list of schools the user attended
skills (值: None) - A list of skills the user possesses
state (值: None) - The state or province of the user's address
streetAddress (值: None) - The street address of the user's place of business
usageLocation (值: None) - Two-letter country code where the user is located
userType (值: None) - Classifies the user type

group.name: group
group.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

output.name: output
output.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output | 默认值: simple
available_options: Simplified (值: simple)
Raw (值: raw)
Selected Fields (值: fields)

fields.name: fields
fields.description: The fields to add to the output
fields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 作用: The fields to add to the output | 默认值: []

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: includeMembers (值: None)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filter.name: filter
filter.description: Query parameter to filter results by
filter.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter | 作用: Query parameter to filter results by

updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: aboutMe (值: None) - A freeform text entry field for the user to describe themselves

companyName (值: None) - The name of the company associated with the user

givenName (值: None) - The given name (first name) of the user

employeeLeaveDateTime (值: None) - The date and time when the user left or will leave the organization
employeeOrgData (值: None) - Represents organization data (for example, division and costCenter) associated with a user

interests (值: None) - A list for the user to describe their interests
jobTitle (值: None) - The user's job title

user.name: user
user.natural_language_description: 参数名: User to Update | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

accountEnabled.name: accountEnabled
accountEnabled.natural_language_description: 参数名: Account Enabled | 作用: Whether the account is enabled | 默认值: True | (必填项)

userPrincipalName.name: userPrincipalName
userPrincipalName.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Principal Name | 作用: The user principal name (UPN) | (必填项)

password.name: password
password.natural_language_description: 参数名: Password | 作用: The password for the user | (必填项)

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: batching (值: None)
allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
